menu.title: Our Menu
menu.item21.name: Chicken Satay Skewers
menu.item21.desc: Indulge in our renowned Glazed Satay Chicken Skewers, a favourite among patrons. Each skewer is a melody of flavors, featuring tender chicken marinated in a unique blend of spices and grilled to golden perfection
menu.item22.name: Lemon Chicken
menu.item22.desc: Dive into the flavors of our Chinese Lemon Chicken, a blend of crispy, golden chicken and a zesty, sweet lemon sauce. Each bite promises a burst of tangy warmth, showcasing the harmony of authentic Chinese culinary artistry.
